name: Oatmeal with Banana
description: Warm rolled oats topped with sliced banana and a drizzle of honey.

instructions.description: Bring water to a gentle boil in a small pot.
Stir in rolled oats and cook, stirring occasionally, until creamy (about 5 minutes).
Top with sliced banana and drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Grilled Chicken Breast
description: Skinless chicken breast grilled with herbs, served with brown rice.

instructions.description: Season chicken breast with herbs, salt, and pepper; brush with olive oil.
Grill over medium-high heat 6–8 minutes per side until internal temp reaches 74°C (165°F).
Serve with cooked brown rice.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Plain low-fat Greek yogurt.

instructions.description: Spoon Greek yogurt into a serving bowl.
Serve chilled; optionally top with fresh fruit or honey.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: Quinoa with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and lemon dressing.

instructions.description: Combine cooked quinoa, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, and avocado in a bowl.
Whisk lemon juice with olive oil; season with salt and pepper.
Toss salad with dressing and serve.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Whole-grain toast topped with mashed avocado and chili flakes.

instructions.description: Toast the bread slices to desired crispness.
Mash avocado with a pinch of salt; spread on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve.

name: Apple
description: Fresh medium red apple.

instructions.description: Rinse the apple thoroughly under running water.
Pat dry and serve whole or sliced.

name: Salmon Fillet
description: Baked salmon with lemon and dill, served with brown rice.

instructions.description: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Place salmon on a lined tray.
Top with lemon slices and dill; season lightly.
Bake 12–15 minutes until flaky. Serve with cooked brown rice.

name: Mixed Nuts
description: A handful of mixed nuts (almonds, cashews, walnuts).

instructions.description: Combine almonds, cashews, and walnuts in a small bowl.
Serve as a snack portion.

name: Spinach Smoothie
description: Blend of spinach, banana, water, and a splash of Greek yogurt.

instructions.description: Add spinach, banana, yogurt, and water to a blender.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Dark Chocolate (70%)
description: Two squares of 70% cocoa dark chocolate.

instructions.description: Break off two squares of dark chocolate.
Serve at room temperature.

name: Egg Omelette with Veggies
description: Three-egg omelette with spinach and bell peppers.

instructions.description: Whisk eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Sauté spinach and bell peppers in olive oil until tender.
Pour eggs into the pan, cook until set, fold, and serve.

name: Beef Stir-Fry with Rice
description: Lean beef stir-fried with veggies and served over white rice.

instructions.description: Stir-fry sliced beef over high heat until browned; set aside.
Stir-fry bell peppers and onions until crisp-tender; add beef back.
Season with soy sauce and serve over cooked white rice.

name: Tofu Buddha Bowl
description: Tofu with quinoa, broccoli, and sesame seeds drizzled with soy sauce.

instructions.description: Pan-sear tofu until golden on all sides.
Arrange tofu with cooked quinoa and steamed broccoli in a bowl.
Sprinkle sesame seeds and drizzle with soy sauce.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
description: Whole-grain toast with peanut butter and banana slices.

instructions.description: Toast the bread slice to your liking.
Spread peanut butter evenly on the toast.
Top with banana slices and serve.

name: Protein Pancakes
description: Oat-based pancakes with eggs and milk.

instructions.description: Blend oats, eggs, and milk until smooth.
Cook batter on a non-stick pan over medium heat until bubbles form, then flip.
Cook the other side until golden; serve warm.

name: Turkey Sandwich on Whole Grain
description: Turkey breast with lettuce and tomato on whole-grain bread.

instructions.description: Layer turkey, lettuce, and tomato between bread slices.
Slice in half and serve.

name: Shrimp Pasta
description: Pasta tossed with shrimp, garlic, and olive oil.

instructions.description: Cook pasta until al dente; reserve some pasta water.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss shrimp with pasta; adjust with pasta water if needed and serve.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Greek yogurt layered with berries and granola.

instructions.description: Layer Greek yogurt with mixed berries in a glass.
Top with granola and serve immediately.

name: Protein Shake
description: Whey protein blended with banana and milk.

instructions.description: Add milk, whey protein, and banana to a blender.
Blend until smooth; serve chilled.

name: Veggie Chili
description: Hearty chili with beans, tomatoes, and mixed vegetables.

instructions.description: Sauté onions and bell peppers until softened.
Add tomatoes and beans; simmer to meld flavors.
Season to taste and serve hot.

name: Scrambled Eggs with Toast
description: Fluffy scrambled eggs served with whole-grain toast.

instructions.description: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Scramble in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat until fluffy.
Serve with toasted bread.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.

instructions.description: Grill chicken breast and slice into strips.
Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with chicken and parmesan; serve immediately.

name: Baked Sweet Potato
description: Whole baked sweet potato with olive oil and herbs.

instructions.description: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Pierce sweet potato with a fork.
Bake 45-55 minutes until tender.
Slice open, drizzle with olive oil, season with herbs.

name: Grilled Tilapia with Vegetables
description: Grilled tilapia fillet with roasted mixed vegetables.

instructions.description: Season tilapia with lemon, salt, and pepper; grill 4-5 minutes per side.
Roast vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots) at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Serve tilapia alongside roasted vegetables.

name: Carrot Sticks with Hummus
description: Fresh carrot sticks with creamy hummus dip.

instructions.description: Cut carrots into stick shapes.
Serve with hummus for dipping.

name: Cottage Cheese with Berries
description: Low-fat cottage cheese topped with fresh mixed berries.

instructions.description: Spoon cottage cheese into a bowl.
Top with fresh berries and serve chilled.

name: Chia Pudding
description: Chia seeds soaked in almond milk with vanilla and honey.

instructions.description: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, vanilla, and honey.
Refrigerate overnight or at least 4 hours until thickened.
Stir and serve chilled, optionally topped with fruit.

name: Tuna Salad Wrap
description: Whole-wheat wrap filled with tuna salad and greens.

instructions.description: Mix canned tuna with mayo, diced celery, and seasonings.
Spread tuna salad on a whole-wheat tortilla.
Add lettuce and tomato, roll tightly, and slice in half.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty lentil soup with carrots, celery, and spices.

instructions.description: Sauté diced onions, carrots, and celery in olive oil.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, and spices; bring to a boil.
Simmer 30-40 minutes until lentils are tender; serve hot.

name: Rice Cakes with Almond Butter
description: Plain rice cakes topped with almond butter.

instructions.description: Spread almond butter evenly on rice cakes.
Serve as a light snack.

name: Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
description: Thick blueberry smoothie topped with granola and sliced fruits.

instructions.description: Blend frozen blueberries, banana, and Greek yogurt until thick.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola, banana slices, and berries.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Wrap with Hummus
description: Grilled chicken with hummus, lettuce, and tomato in a tortilla.

instructions.description: Grill chicken breast and slice thinly.
Spread hummus on tortilla, add chicken, lettuce, and tomato.
Roll tightly and slice in half.

name: Baked Cod with Quinoa
description: Baked cod fillet served with fluffy quinoa and steamed broccoli.

instructions.description: Season cod with lemon, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 15-18 minutes until flaky.
Serve with cooked quinoa and steamed broccoli.

name: Banana
description: Fresh ripe banana.

instructions.description: Peel and eat fresh.

name: Whole Wheat Bagel with Cream Cheese
description: Toasted whole wheat bagel with light cream cheese.

instructions.description: Slice bagel in half and toast to desired crispness.
Spread cream cheese evenly on both halves.
Serve immediately.

name: Pork Chop with Mashed Potatoes
description: Grilled pork chop served with creamy mashed potatoes.

instructions.description: Season pork chop with salt, pepper, and herbs; grill 5-6 minutes per side.
Boil potatoes until tender, mash with butter and milk.
Serve pork chop alongside mashed potatoes.

name: Orange
description: Fresh orange, peeled and segmented.

instructions.description: Peel orange and separate into segments.
Serve fresh.

name: Phở Gà
description: Vietnamese chicken noodle soup with rice noodles, chicken breast, and aromatic herbs.

instructions.description: Boil chicken breast in ginger-infused broth for 20 minutes until cooked through.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
Slice cooked chicken thinly.
Place noodles in a bowl, top with chicken slices, pour hot broth over.
Garnish with cilantro, scallions, bean sprouts, lime, and chili.

name: Bánh Mì Trứng
description: Vietnamese baguette with fried eggs, pate, pickled vegetables, and fresh herbs.

instructions.description: Slice baguette lengthwise and lightly toast.
Spread pate on one side of the bread.
Fry eggs sunny-side up or over-easy.
Layer eggs, pickled carrots and daikon, cucumber slices, cilantro, and chili.
Drizzle with soy sauce or Maggi seasoning; close sandwich and serve.

name: Cơm Tấm Sườn
description: Vietnamese broken rice with grilled pork chop, sunny-side-up egg, and pickled vegetables.

instructions.description: Marinate pork chop with lemongrass, garlic, fish sauce, and sugar for 30 minutes.
Grill pork chop over medium-high heat 5-6 minutes per side until charred and cooked through.
Cook broken rice according to package instructions.
Fry egg sunny-side up.
Plate rice, top with grilled pork, egg, pickled vegetables, and drizzle with fish sauce.

name: Bún Bò Huế
description: Spicy Vietnamese beef noodle soup with thick rice noodles, beef shank, and pork.

instructions.description: Simmer beef bones, lemongrass, and spices for 2-3 hours to make rich broth.
Boil beef shank and pork until tender; slice thinly.
Cook thick rice noodles according to package; drain.
Place noodles in bowl, add meat, pour hot broth over.
Garnish with banana blossom, herbs, lime, and chili oil.

name: Cơm Gà
description: Hainanese chicken rice with poached chicken, fragrant rice cooked in chicken fat, and dipping sauces.

instructions.description: Poach whole chicken with ginger and scallions for 40 minutes; let rest, then chop into pieces.
Fry garlic in chicken fat, add rice and chicken broth; cook until fluffy.
Prepare ginger-scallion sauce and chili sauce.
Plate rice, top with chicken pieces, cucumber slices, and herbs.
Serve with dipping sauces and chicken broth on the side.

name: Bún Chả Hà Nội
description: Hanoi-style grilled pork with vermicelli noodles, herbs, and sweet-sour dipping sauce.

instructions.description: Marinate ground pork and pork belly slices with fish sauce, sugar, garlic, and pepper.
Grill pork patties and belly slices until caramelized and charred.
Prepare dipping sauce with fish sauce, sugar, vinegar, water, garlic, and chili.
Cook vermicelli noodles; drain and set aside.
Serve grilled pork in dipping sauce bowl with noodles, herbs, and pickled vegetables on the side.

name: Mì Quảng
description: Central Vietnamese turmeric noodles with shrimp, pork, peanuts, and herbs.

instructions.description: Cook turmeric-infused wide rice noodles; drain.
Sauté shrimp and pork slices with garlic and turmeric.
Prepare broth with pork stock and turmeric.
Place noodles in bowl, top with shrimp and pork, add a small amount of broth.
Garnish with roasted peanuts, sesame rice crackers, lettuce, herbs, and lime.

name: Phở Bò
description: Classic Vietnamese beef noodle soup with rice noodles, beef slices, and aromatic broth.

instructions.description: Simmer beef bones with star anise, cinnamon, ginger, and onions for 3-4 hours.
Cook flat rice noodles according to package; drain.
Blanch thin beef slices briefly in hot broth.
Place noodles in bowl, arrange beef on top, pour hot broth over.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro, onions, basil, bean sprouts, lime, and chili.

name: Cơm Chiên Dương Châu
description: Chinese-style fried rice with shrimp, Chinese sausage, eggs, peas, and carrots.

instructions.description: Use day-old cooked rice for best texture.
Scramble eggs in wok; set aside.
Stir-fry shrimp and Chinese sausage until cooked.
Add rice, peas, carrots, and scrambled eggs; stir-fry over high heat.
Season with soy sauce, oyster sauce, and white pepper; serve hot.

name: Bún Riêu Cua
description: Vietnamese crab and tomato noodle soup with vermicelli, tofu, and fresh herbs.

instructions.description: Prepare tomato-based broth with crab paste, shrimp paste, and annatto oil.
Add fried tofu and tomato wedges; simmer 15 minutes.
Cook vermicelli noodles; drain and place in bowl.
Drop crab and egg mixture into simmering broth to form curds.
Pour broth and toppings over noodles; garnish with herbs, lime, and chili paste.

name: Cá Kho Tộ
description: Vietnamese caramelized fish in clay pot served with steamed rice and pickled vegetables.

instructions.description: Marinate fish chunks with fish sauce, sugar, pepper, and garlic for 20 minutes.
Caramelize sugar in clay pot until golden brown.
Add fish, coconut water, and simmer over low heat for 30-40 minutes until sauce reduces.
Cook white rice separately.
Serve fish with sauce over rice, with pickled vegetables and fresh herbs on the side.

name: Canh Chua Cá
description: Vietnamese sweet and sour fish soup with pineapple, tomatoes, and herbs served with rice.

instructions.description: Bring water to boil with tamarind paste for sour base.
Add tomatoes, pineapple chunks, okra, and bean sprouts; simmer 10 minutes.
Add fish chunks and cook until just done, about 5-8 minutes.
Season with fish sauce and sugar; add herbs.
Serve hot soup with steamed white rice on the side.
